name: .hack//Fragment
synopsis: The ''.hack'' series takes place in a virtual Online world -- that is to say, they're Offline games whose story has Online themes. With ''.hack//fragment'', Bandai and co-developers Cyber Connect 2 and Artdink are taking the series into the realm of true Online gameplay for the first time. Using a standard network adapter (no need for a hard disk) you'll have the option of adventuring alongside players throughout the country.
